https://via.placeholder.com/600x400?text.title: Picture 1: School Library
questions: Describe the picture. What are the students doing in the library?
Tell me about a time when you studied in a library.
Do you think libraries are still important in the digital age? Why or why not?
suggestions: In the picture, students are reading books and working on computers in a quiet library. Some are sitting at tables, taking notes.
I once studied for my exams in the city library. It was quiet and comfortable, and I could focus very well.
Yes, libraries are important because they provide a peaceful study space, access to books, and free internet for everyone.

https://via.placeholder.com/600x400?text.title: Picture 2: Supermarket
questions: Describe the picture. What can you see in the supermarket?
Tell me about a time when you went shopping for groceries.
Do you prefer shopping in a supermarket or a small store? Why?
suggestions: In the picture, there are aisles full of products, people pushing trolleys, and a cashier counter at the front.
Last weekend, I went to the supermarket with my mother. We bought fruits, vegetables, and some snacks.
I prefer supermarkets because they have a wide variety of products, good prices, and everything is in one place.

https://via.placeholder.com/600x400?text.title: Picture 3: Mountain Hiking
questions: Describe the picture. What are the hikers doing?
Tell me about a time when you went hiking or visited the mountains.
What are the benefits of hiking for health and well-being?
suggestions: In the picture, hikers are walking on a mountain trail. They are carrying backpacks and wearing hiking boots.
Two years ago, I went hiking with my friends in a national park. The view from the top was amazing.
Hiking improves physical health, reduces stress, and allows people to connect with nature.

beach.png.title: Picture 4: Beach Holiday
questions: Describe the picture. What are the people doing on the beach?
Tell me about a time when you went to the beach.
Do you prefer holidays at the beach or in the mountains? Why?
suggestions: In the picture, people are swimming, playing volleyball, and sunbathing on the beach.
Last summer, I went to the beach with my family. We swam in the sea and built sandcastles.
I prefer the beach because I enjoy swimming and relaxing by the sea.
